PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2016-00962016-02-26NR,  CRA,  ,  ,  ,  , 
ActIncome Tax Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Income Tax Regulations (Withholding of Income Tax on Payments from Registered Disability Savings Plans)
PrecisRegulations Amending the INCOME TAX REGULATIONS (WITHHOLDING OF INCOME TAX ON PAYMENTS FROM REGISTERED DISABILITY SAVINGS PLANS) in order to (1) enable the withholding of income tax from payments from Registered Disability Savings Plans; (2) ensure that the appropriate amount of income tax is withheld on the correct amounts; and (3) ensure that the Canada Revenue Agency has the information it needs for the administration and enforcement of the Act.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2016-0030 Publication Date: 2016-03-09
AttachmentsAttachment
